website_summaries.verdict: The 200GB SanDisk Ultra is the highest-capacity microSD card available, and it's terrific for hi-res audio or action camera enthusiasts.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic at the right price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 65 quid which for this capacity is unbelieveable. It came from Amazon direct so it's a genuine one. Fitted in my Surface Pro 4 for extra storage and so far so good. Highly recommended at this price. Next size up is double the price for an extra 56gb. Typical Sandisk ultra speed, would not work so well in a go pro or a fast camera. Ideal for phones and tablets or even laptops with media or game storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after a couple of weeks lost too much data to trust this brand
customer_reviews.author: Melody Maker

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in April as a backup to my old SD Card. Only to now open up and find out it is not working. My Samsung S7 does not recognise it neither does my Windows 8 and 10 laptops. Unfortualtely I can't return it as I only found out after the return policy window closed. I am leaving this review as I am extremly pained after shelling out so much for a useless item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Odunayo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for older Macbook pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as storage for my windows phone a year ago but have since dumped Microsoft entirely (after they dumped windows phones themselves and then made an OS which is hideously boxy AND wont run old games) and now use it in my 2015 Macbook Pro SD card slot as extra storage (adding 200gb of storage to back up the 256 SSD). It very easily holds pictures, text documents, and even movies which play from the card with no problem at all. All owners of Macbooks with card slots should get one of these, they are an excellent and simple expansion.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L. Porter

customer_reviews.title: SanDisk Ultra 200 GB MicroSDXC UHS-I Memory Card with SD Adapter - Sold by: Amazon EU S.a.r.L. - £65.99 (inc. postage)
customer_reviews.text: SanDisk Ultra 200 GB MicroSDXC UHS-I Memory Card with SD Adapter - Sold by: Amazon EU S.a.r.L. - £65.99 (inc. postage) I used a piece of software called "SD Insight" to check the memory card and the software provided the following information: Manufacturer - Sandisk Model - SC200 Size - 197GB Manufacture date - Jul 2017 I inserted the memory card into a Samsung Galaxy Tab A and then formatted the card. Then I transferred about 12GB of music to the card from a PC computer and everything seems to be working fine. The music plays well and so far everything seems to be in order.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier! Great Amazon experience!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this SD card with these USB C adapters and I couldn't be happier!  The card has a very fast upload and download time. I needed to replace my previous 64GB Sandisk card as I used all the memory! I highly recommened if you are after a high quality SD card :) The USB C adaptersmake a great combo - it has allowed me to link my tablet to my phone and download everything I need. They are great quality and I highly recommend the too! I managed to take some AMAZING pictures of a bird bath we also bought off Amazon Another great experience on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amz Shopper!

customer_reviews.title: A Good ad card...so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought recently to use in a LG V20 smartphone &, card is working perfectly fine so far. I am a bit cautious though as my 32gb by another company stopped working in my wives phone but, that may have to do with that it was been used as part of the internal storage as "adoptive storage". So I`ll update this review if & when things change, thank you for reading 4 stars. PS.Delivery on point as item was delivered with in time stated & pricing was fair too.
customer_reviews.author: e white

customer_reviews.title: Idea for S7.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in a Samsung S7. Works without issue...as mentioned in other reviews, the phone calculates the capacity as 183GB, so don't be surprised by the lower capacity that stated (as with all computer storage). Speed is fast enough for operations so far (for HD video, and burst photos I understand the phone writes to it's faster internal memory. Amazing how much data can be recorded on a thing so tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing read speed in test. 183gb usable space.
customer_reviews.text: Received my 200gb card today. I've just done a H2testw with the following results:- Warning: Only 187713 of 187714 MByte tested. Test finished without errors. You can now delete the test files *.h2w or verify them again. Writing speed: 14.1 MByte/s Reading speed: 17.5 MByte/s H2testw v1.4 The test was done using the card adaptor included and straight into my Asus G73jh built in card reader. I don't know why I've got such slow read speeds but I'm assuming its the card reader in my laptop. I'm getting a USB 3 adaptor so will re-test it with that.
customer_reviews.author: lebowski

customer_reviews.title: Works fine in my high res music player. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I use this card in my Fiio X5 II high res music player (playing lossless CD quality files and high res files) and it works fine. Does what it says on the tin.About 186 G bytes of usable storage after formatting.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: One Year later... Dead
customer_reviews.text: Not really been using it that heavily, but about a year later, wanted to update some music on it and it keeps bringing up error messages, tried reformatting it, no joy, removing the partition in Gparted, still no good. probably only just out of warranty too, funny that!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Tijou

customer_reviews.title: but instead I have wasted 42 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Not what I would expect from SanDisk as they are often very reliable. Unfortunately this 200GB micro sd card does not work properly with my Microsoft Surface Pro 3 256GB. It dismounts at will almost immediately and I am unable to use it adequately. I have attempted to use the card in other devices and I have had similar problems. I thought that I had grabbed myself a bargain, but instead I have wasted 42 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: amir rashid

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product.
customer_reviews.text: A lot cheaper than 256GB. The price per GB makes the most sense here I feel. It works well on my Samsung Galaxy S8 and Samsung Tab S2
customer_reviews.author: N. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Heed my words
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product for modern phones, an extra 200GB of one-off-payment storage! My HTC supports this and I highly recommend it for anything that supports such a high number, YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sephiroth Ricomaine

customer_reviews.title: This is currently the micro sd card I have in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is currently the micro sd card I have in my Samsung S8 Plus, to date have had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing space and an amazin price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Bought this to go in my Sony Xperia Z5 Premium and it's great! So much space in a small micro sd and the read/write speeds are great on a supported reader! Never gonna need another storage solution for my phones!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, fast delivery, good packaging, have used this on 2 phones now and never had any problems
customer_reviews.author: Alan dunne

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Having just had to return a faulty Lexmark card has prompted me to review the SanDisk. I now have 2 of these SanDisk 200 gb cards. Both work perfectly with fast no hassle transfer of folders and files. It might be slightly more expensive than the Lexmark but I'm sticking with SanDisk from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mr A T Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for phones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to increase the storage of my Samsung Galaxy S8. I have had no issues with speed at all, when I inserted it into my phone and formatted it I had 183GB free space (I am not sure where the rest went)
customer_reviews.author: Nabil

customer_reviews.title: Economical alternative to 256Gb version
customer_reviews.text: An addition to a collection of the same capacity. Although my media player will accept 256GB cards, these are a more economical and affordable alternative as, although 20% of the potential is lost, you could buy two of these for about the same amount.
customer_reviews.author: Londoner

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to fit into our HP Tablet computer to expand the memory. Works perfectly and at a very good price
customer_reviews.author: Graham Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Nintendo Switch.
customer_reviews.text: Brought it to use with the Nintendo Switch and it works perfectly so far, only your games and screenshots get stored on the SD Card so no worries about losing any saves.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bazely

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the last generation of Mac book Pro computers
customer_reviews.text: Only recently surpassed by Sandisc, my card is now holding my iTunes library, saving the respective space from my SDD. Highly recommended for the last generation of Mac book Pro computers, where they can be housed flush, secure and easily backed up with time machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ains

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over a year, and no problems. Loving the large capacity
customer_reviews.author: Ali CU

customer_reviews.title: OTHER THAN THAT GREAT WAY TO HAVE SOME EXTRA
customer_reviews.text: WORKS ADVERTISED! NEED TO FORMAT IT USING THE SD CARD ADAPTER IF YOU ARE USING IT WITH A MAC OR IT WONT SHOW UP IF YOU USE IT WITH THE NIFTY DRIVE ADAPTER. OTHER THAN THAT GREAT WAY TO HAVE SOME EXTRA STORAGE
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Sandisk 200
customer_reviews.text: What can you say. The sd card is what it says on the box. It runs fine and so far no problems. The pacaging was a bit of a challenge but a hand pair of scissors sorted that out. If needed i would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity. Works in all my devices
customer_reviews.text: Good capacity. Works in all my devices. Takes ages to fill up ( my tests were giving 15MBytes/sec write but the roughly 6 times faster read ) but this is less important in a phone ( playing videos, etc ) .
customer_reviews.author: R B.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Samsung Galaxy 7 Edge. Super easy to install, instantly have all the memory you'll ever need. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: jbkb

customer_reviews.title: Memory cards
customer_reviews.text: I have several sandisk cards I have never had a problem with them I am very happy with the quality of the product and recommend the SanDisk cards to anyone who needs or uses memory card storage
customer_reviews.author: martin24

customer_reviews.title: VALUE FOR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This memory card has plenty of storage space for music and videos. Value for money and well worth investing in. I recommend this product 100%. I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: The SD card went straight into my new Xperia X ...
customer_reviews.text: The SD card went straight into my new Xperia X. I've already saved a mass of music as well as some videos. It hasn't given me any trouble which is just what I would expect from SanDisk which is why I went for this one.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Mega memory
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put games on my Nintendo Switch. Good value and speedy.
customer_reviews.author: N. Beardshall

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the package
customer_reviews.text: Big memory, decent price. Nothing more needs to be said
customer_reviews.author: Enoch Baffour

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my Samsung galaxy note 4
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Samsung galaxy note 4. Only down side is altho it states 200gb mine only hade 180gb usable.
customer_reviews.author: Dhani

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product ..... late review ... you get 185gb max on this micro sd ... I purchased mine when it was fairly new so I payed £80 for it .... not happy that's it wenter down to £30 now =(
customer_reviews.author: Mubeen Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Please don't expect the full 200 GB. But even ...
customer_reviews.text: Please don't expect the full 200 GB. But even with the 180 something I was left with still a huge amount of memory.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: For use with Switch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing storage for the price. Also one of the best micro sds on the market in terms of speed and quality. Bought to use with Nintendo Switch. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was worried that the 200GB version would not work ...
customer_reviews.text: .... but it does! Shows up as 183GB available but that means it is a true 200GB. The way storage is calculated means actual available is always less than advertised. Not to forget that 1K is equal to 1024 bytes and not 1000.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: spot on
customer_reviews.text: This works well with Amazon Fire which is why I purchased. Size is as described which was fantastic. Price also pretty reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C. J. Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Great for back up memory
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of SanDisk, normally work really well. Not been let down by them in the past. So far works well with my sony phone, fast and loads of memory.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing extension product for my MacBook 128 Gb!
customer_reviews.text: Had this product since 2016 for my 128 GB MacBook Pro, and it works perfect till today 2018, works good as new, can transfer files fast from Internal SSD to this 200 GB micro SD! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Salim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Have used these Micro SDX cards previously and was happy with them so bought another one for new laptop. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wolstencroft

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this is barely more expensive than a 128GB card and significantly cheaper than a 256GB card. Bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I have this in use with the DASEQI shallow micro SD adapter which adds affordable memory to my MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. Murfin

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my S8 plus
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in my samsung S8+ no issues. Price was far less than many other products from other brands and it seems to work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hired Ranger

customer_reviews.title: No problems with card in either surface book or phone.
customer_reviews.text: Used in conjunction with Bosvision Aluminium Micro adapter on Surface Book. Have had no issue with the card at all. I use the same card in a Lumina 950 XL where it works well too
customer_reviews.author: flyinggate

customer_reviews.title: Great little Micro Sd card
customer_reviews.text: Great little Micro Sd card, good transfer speed. I use this to give myself more storage on my Macbook Air.Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: wozza

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: My entire music collection fits on this. Not too many overheating issues. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Should Have This
customer_reviews.text: I mean 200GB on a micro SD. What a time to be alive.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C

customer_reviews.title: Truly authentic micro sd card and not a defective one surprisingly.
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine a few a hours ago, transferred all of my music library, video library and picture library onto this card and there seems to be no problems at all. Completely authentic card and is definitely without no doubt a fake card, also saved some money as an added bonus. Happily would recommend it to anyone who is confined with space on their phones. 'Worked on my Samsung galaxy note 4.'
customer_reviews.author: Gibriel

customer_reviews.title: Looks the real thing to me.
customer_reviews.text: No problems size reported as correct and seems perfectly genuine. Supplied in the right packaging too.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, it was to replace one I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, it was to replace one I bought one online and it was a fake with the Samsung name on it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Frost

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with the Nintendo Switch & works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bastet

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but thats it. It died after 4 months of use with my Nintendo Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is to much bites for my phone will keep ...
customer_reviews.text: This is to much bites for my phone will keep it when I upgraded To Samsung 7 lovely jubly

customer_reviews.title: superb addition to my galsxy s7
customer_reviews.text: Good value and exactly what I expected, thank you seller

customer_reviews.title: All seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: All seems good so far. It is a shame the price rises so high when you go above a 128 card.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: What stores everything for a rpi3 based arcade build? This little card. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dunphy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great card. Very good performance. A little expensive. The included adapter, and 10 year warranty seal the deal.
customer_reviews.author: shanesully

customer_reviews.title: Sandisk Ultra micro sd card 200GB
customer_reviews.text: Really deal great price have it in my tablets loads of room fir music and photos if you convert music to mp3 give even more space on card
customer_reviews.author: Martin Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for my Nintendo Switch and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: albertdlc95

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Switch
customer_reviews.text: The 200gb model works great in Nintendo Switch! It's a fast and reliable memory card, and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: cD

customer_reviews.title: Room for more!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job so far. Lots of space! Seems Speedy but not really put through its paces. Used for S7 which it let me move all my Photos/Vids over to it and great for 4k filming!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: A class product, have been using it flawlessly for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanouel

customer_reviews.title: As this was at a remarkably low price, I ...
customer_reviews.text: As this was at a remarkably low price, I was suspicious. I tested it with h2testw, and it passed with flying colours. It is now in my phone and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: NineToTheSky

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, I can't say enough good things about sandisk, sd cards, usb sticks, always last and work.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and super fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a great ad on to my Nintendo switch!
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this card for use with the Nintendo Switch after reading an article on a gaming site recommending this particular card. It provides plenty of space for downloadable games and good read/write speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Mattias Lundahl

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works brilliantly and highly recommend. And since the release of the 256GB the 200GB is excellent value money.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Cats

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what you would expect/ hope it to do
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: 200Gb formatted 186Gb, great speed, class 10, SDXC
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but works a treat, 200GB formatted is 186Gb, in my Note 4 phone + 32Gb onboard a monster. Delivered via prime 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it for my S8+ phone, its fast and reliable.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor write speed. Took an hour to transfer 5gb. Awful

customer_reviews.title: Fine in Surface Pro 4
customer_reviews.text: Using in in my SP4. Lots of space and works a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shame about the wasted packaging great item tho.
customer_reviews.text: Works a treat no issues so far installed in my tablet with over 80gb music on. But the packaging...come on Amazon a small padded envelope would have been fine but a box (See pic)

customer_reviews.title: What better memory card to complement such a good tablet.
customer_reviews.text: As much memory as I could ever need for my Samsung galaxy tab A 10.1,thousands of photos and songs and /or full HD films.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this micro SDXC card for my Samsung S7 Edge. Works great as my phone was running out of space. Now all my photos and video's are automatically stored on the memory card instead of phone storage. Product arrived fast, and working perfectly in the phone. I can recommend this 100%

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Switch, inserted it, asks to format and worked perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Work great, no issues.

customer_reviews.title: If you need the space - just go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Does it job perfectly on my Surface Pro 4. If you need the space - just go for it.

customer_reviews.title: Write speed slower than expected, but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: Positives: - Works on my Samsung Galaxy S5 - Great read speed (~100mb) using h2testw program - Comes with an adapter - Speedy next day delivery Negatives: - Write speed was much slower than expected (17.8mb) using h2testw program.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works with my lumia 950 XL - pretty happy with it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Good value, large capacity card..no problem running steam games off it. Just what I needed!

product_meta.title: SanDisk Ultra 200 GB MicroSDXC UHS-I Memory Card with SD Adapter - Standard Packaging
product_meta.description:
SanDisk Ultra 200 GB MicroSDXC UHS-I Memory Card with SD Adapter - Standard Packaging.

BOX CONTAINS
1x MicroSD cards with adapter
feature_bullets: Class 10 for full HD video recording and playback
Ideal for premium Android-based smartphones, tablets and cameras

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,149 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
